jdraw.framework

Enum DrawModelEvent.Type

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<DrawModelEvent.Type>
      • jdraw.framework.DrawModelEvent.Type
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Comparable<DrawModelEvent.Type>
    Enclosing class:
    DrawModelEvent

    public static enum DrawModelEvent.Type
extends Enum<DrawModelEvent.Type>
    This enum describes the type of event.

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      DRAWING_CHANGED
      This event indicates that more than one figure has changed, e.g.\ that the order of the figures has changed.
      DRAWING_CLEARED
      This event indicates that the whole drawing was cleared, i.e.\ all figures were removed at once.
      FIGURE_ADDED
      Indicates that a figure was added to the draw model.
      FIGURE_CHANGED
      Indicates that the position or the size of a figure was changed in the draw model.
      FIGURE_REMOVED
      Indicates that a figure was removed from the draw model.

    • Method Summary

      Returns the enum constant of this type with the specified name.

      Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        getClass, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Enum Constant Detail

      • FIGURE_ADDED

        public static final DrawModelEvent.Type FIGURE_ADDED
        Indicates that a figure was added to the draw model.

      • FIGURE_REMOVED

        public static final DrawModelEvent.Type FIGURE_REMOVED
        Indicates that a figure was removed from the draw model.

      • FIGURE_CHANGED

        public static final DrawModelEvent.Type FIGURE_CHANGED
        Indicates that the position or the size of a figure was changed in the draw model.

      • DRAWING_CLEARED

        public static final DrawModelEvent.Type DRAWING_CLEARED
        This event indicates that the whole drawing was cleared, i.e.\ all figures were removed at once.

      • DRAWING_CHANGED

        public static final DrawModelEvent.Type DRAWING_CHANGED
        This event indicates that more than one figure has changed, e.g.\ that the order of the figures has changed. The view has to redraw the whole scene. However, no figure was added or removed.
